Name: data
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this dataset using the provided DOI and reference the associated publication.
EthicsApprovals: This study received ethical approval from the Ethics Commission of the Faculty of Human Sciences, University of Bern (2023-10-00006).

GeneratedBy.Name: PsychoPy3
GeneratedBy.Description: Behavioral experiment created and run using PsychoPy Builder.

TaskDescription: This dataset includes data from two behavioral tasks: (1) the Balloon Analogue Risk Task (BART) and (2) the Game of Dice Task (GDT). They played each task 3 times (run 1-3 for each task). During each block, galvanic vestibular stimulation with different polarity (L-GVS, R-GVS, sham) was administered to the participants. A break of 5 minutes was set between the blocks.

Tasks.Description: Participants inflated virtual balloons with different (unknown) breaking points to earn points, providing a measure of risk-taking.
Participants selected dice combinations with varying winning probabilities to maximize points, providing a measure of decision-making under risk.
